title: BEST CHAMP
body:
Xerath has the BEST dance in the game, if riot rework him or change shit, that dance better not leave. 

I have nothing more to add.

replies.body:
I have something to add !!!!

JANNA {{champion:40}} IS THE BEST CHAMP <3
but can she dance the shit out of Xerath... maybe... calls for a dance off
